recipe_name: Mixed salad of apricots and strawberries
author: Ed Baines
method: Mix all the ingredients apart from the yoghurt together. Serve in a bowl and place a dollop of yoghurt on top.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz apricots, chopped,  100g/3½oz strawberries, chopped,  1 lime, juice only,  handful fresh mint, chopped,  handful fresh basil, chopped,  1 tsp caster sugar,  dollop yoghurt, to serve
